alert.note: Alert for Cannon; Rutherford; Williamson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 1:33PM CDT until June 29 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rutherford County in Middle Tennessee... Eastern Williamson County in Middle Tennessee... Southwestern Cannon County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 133 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Franklin to near Nolensville to Walterhill, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Franklin, Smyrna, Brentwood, La Vergne, Nolensville, Thompson`s Station, Walterhill, Eagleville, Lascassas, Christiana, Natchez Trace At Highway 96, Triune, Rockvale, Bradyville and Readyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
